abstract:
Project Briefing
Carl Malamud
sr. fellow/cto
EyeSpan.TV
‣The basic idea:
‣Put a camera in every 
congressional hearing, the white 
House Briefing room, and other 
locations in “official” DC.
‣Stream the data live out to the 
net.
‣Create a permanent archive 
accessible on the net.
‣Allow anybody to annotate the 
events.
Center for 
American 
Progress 
‣501(c)(3) Think Tank in 
Washington, D.C.
‣Our Role
‣Project Incubator
‣Why?
‣Promote transparency and citizen 
participation in government.
‣We
